item.title: About Me
item.description: Writer Do I write science fiction? I wear a watch that Dick Tracy never dreamed of and I’m typing this on a device that would look at home on Captain Picard’s desk. I write fiction about people trying to make sense of a world that runs on science. Engineer I’m a kubernetes fan boy and I will talk about it at parties if not monitored. I’ve worked with a lot of great people on projects like Call of Duty: Elite, Society6, and Procore.
